primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
To withdrawal CAD using Ndax mobile site, follow these steps:

  1. Tap the Ndax symbol in the top left-hand corner.
  2. Select WALLET from the sidebar menu.
  3. Tap CANADIAN DOLLAR.
  4. Scroll to the bottom and tap the up arrow (SEND).
  5. Choose your withdrawal method: EFT or INTERAC E-TRANSFER.
  6. If you chose EFT, tap BANK ACCOUNT and select your bank. If this is your first time withdrawing via EFT, tap ADD NEW BANK ACCOUNT.
  7. Enter the amount you would like to withdraw or tap MAX.
  8. Read and tap the checkbox to agree to the disclaimer.
  9. Tap WITHDRAW.
  10. Enter the six-digit 2FA authentication code from your 2FA app.
  11. Confirm your withdrawal by clicking the link in the confirmation email.

Processing Times:

  • EFT Withdrawals: Processed twice daily on business days at 8:00 AM and 4:00 PM EST. Funds typically arrive within 1 business day, depending on your bank.
  • Interac e-Transfers: Usually received within a few minutes but may take up to 30â€“60 minutes.
